about_the_game:
Lunarium




At the bottom, the Sea of Chaos, the birthplace of bubble worlds, where countless bubbles rise, gradually giving life;
At the top, above the Veil of Stars, is the realm where "God" and Childrens dwell, with the glow of stars illuminating the bubbles;
Between these, bubbles float upwards quietly and slowly.

Yet, bubbles rising from the sea can never cross the veil to become eternal. They are destined to burst eventually, their protective water film becoming lighter and then—pop. They shatter, destroyed, with all debris falling back into the sea, merging into the chaos, awaiting rebirth in a new cycle.

Play as Ave, a light-armored knight. Meet a girl with light flaxen hair and embark on a journey beyond reality to save a world on the brink of bursting.

Gameplay




  • Play as Ave, journey together with Lune. Fight side-by-side, collaborate seamlessly for smooth, coordinated attacks.
  • Combat inspired by classic games, featuring strategic maneuvers. Parrying and countering at critical moments to turn the tide of battle.
  • On different battle situations, promptly seek assistance from Lune, cleverly employ distinct skills to prevail.
  • Collect threads of hope throughout your journey to boost their strength. Learn new skills and magic, discover new combat strategies.
  • At the end of each leg of the journey, you will face intimidating enemies. Defeat them to advance.



  • Explore intricately structured levels, enhanced by an attractive art style that creates an atmospheric experience.
  • Hand-crafted animations, vividly showcasing the personalities and charm of the characters.
  • Wander through distinct realms: old shrine that no longer visited, ruins of a shattered kingdom, and churches shrouded in dark mist.
  • Record observations and experiences in the notebook carried on your journey... The world and the cosmos are wondrous, and as you gather remnants among the stars, you may uncover even more secrets.
  • Enemies of various forms but equal danger lurk within the remnants of the world, a reminder to always be cautious during your adventure.



  • Memory, self, and meaning. Under layers of intertwining narratives, the world and its characters together tell a tale of both sorrow and resolute.

"Our journey begins with parting, and perhaps it will also face parting in the end. The hardships along the way will surpass your understanding and imagination... You might even feel pain because of this."
"Even so, will you still come with me?"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / RX 460
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti / RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Lunarium is an atmospheric fantasy A-RPG. Play as Ave, a light-armored knight, who teams up with Lune, a mysterious Starfarer. Together, they journey to save a dying world, engaging in challenging battles to retrieve the lost glow of the stars and forsaken memories, unveiling cosmic secrets.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
